author: Soo Kim
title: We Haven't 'Hit the Peak' in U.S. Coronavirus Deaths Yet, Warns Nate Silver
description: While the daily death toll has been increasing, the rate of increase in new fatalities has been declining in recent weeks.
content:
Daily deaths from the novel coronavirus continue to rise in the U.S., with the country now having 28,000 deaths among its 639,600 confirmed cases, according to the latest figures from Johns Hopkins University.
The country's death toll may have not reached it… [+7570 chars]
